column3: Static and dynamic call hierarchy for Python
Please revert your changes to .idea/* files.
Do you really need any changes in this class for creating your call hierarchy test?
Python tests should not depend on Java tests.
Are these dependencies really necessary?
What's the idea behind these changes?

How do you handle nested classes and functions nested into the function? Please add tests and exclude calls from nested scopes. A more effective way of walking down a tree is a visitor, see PyRecursiveElementVisitor.
Why do you need a separate pop-up menu for Python call hierarchy?
@traff Please review the dynamic part related to the debugger.
I have cherry-picked and refactored the static call hierarchy implementation into master.
